WorkflowInfo.Name: Create snapshots report
WorkflowInfo.Description: Create a report that includes server name and its snapshots
WorkflowInfo.Xoml:
<SequentialWorkflowActivity x:Name="CustomWorkflow" xmlns:ns0="clr-namespace:CreateMemoryTable;Assembly=CreateMemoryTable, Version=2.0.0.0, Culture=neutral, PublicKeyToken=null" xmlns:ns1="clr-namespace:VMList;Assembly=VMList, Version=2.0.0.0, Culture=neutral, PublicKeyToken=null" xmlns:ns2="clr-namespace:GetRowsCount;Assembly=GetRowsCount, Version=2.0.0.0, Culture=neutral, PublicKeyToken=null" xmlns:ns3="clr-namespace:ConvertToHTMLTable;Assembly=ConvertToHTMLTable, Version=2.0.0.0, Culture=neutral, PublicKeyToken=null" xmlns:ns4="clr-namespace:GetDate;Assembly=GetDate, Version=2.0.0.0, Culture=neutral, PublicKeyToken=null" xmlns:ns5="clr-namespace:WriteXLS;Assembly=WriteXLS, Version=2.0.0.0, Culture=neutral, PublicKeyToken=null" xmlns:ns6="clr-namespace:SendEmail;Assembly=SendEmail, Version=2.0.0.0, Culture=neutral, PublicKeyToken=null" xmlns:ns7="clr-namespace:ExitWhile;Assembly=ExitWhile, Version=2.0.0.0, Culture=neutral, PublicKeyToken=null" xmlns:ns8="clr-namespace:GetCellValue;Assembly=GetCellValue, Version=2.0.0.0, Culture=neutral, PublicKeyToken=null" xmlns:ns9="clr-namespace:VMListSnapshot;Assembly=VMListSnapshot, Version=2.0.0.0, Culture=neutral, PublicKeyToken=null" xmlns:ns10="clr-namespace:AddMemoryTableRow;Assembly=AddMemoryTableRow, Version=2.0.0.0, Culture=neutral, PublicKeyToken=null" xmlns:ns11="clr-namespace:VMSnapshotInfo;Assembly=VMSnapshotInfo, Version=2.0.0.0, Culture=neutral, PublicKeyToken=null" xmlns:ns12="clr-namespace:SetCellValue;Assembly=SetCellValue, Version=2.0.0.0, Culture=neutral, PublicKeyToken=null" xmlns:x="http://schemas.microsoft.com/winfx/2006/xaml" xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/winfx/2006/xaml/workflow" x:Class="WorkflowDesignerControl.CustomWorkflow"> <ns0:CreateMemoryTable IsValid="True" x:Name="createMemoryTable1" ColumnNumber="3" TableName="Report" RowNumber="0" isEmptyGrid="0" RecoveryMethodSelection="{x:Null}" Description="Creates a memory table." DisplayName="Create Memory Table" TypeName="CreateMemoryTable" TableAsString="<NewDataSet>
 <xs:schema id="NewDataSet" xmlns="" xmlns:xs="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema" xmlns:msdata="urn:schemas-microsoft-com:xml-msdata">
 <xs:element name="NewDataSet" msdata:IsDataSet="true" msdata:MainDataTable="resultSet" msdata:UseCurrentLocale="true">
 <xs:complexType>
 <xs:choice minOccurs="0" maxOccurs="unbounded">
 <xs:element name="resultSet">
 <xs:complexType>
 <xs:sequence>
 <xs:element name="VM_x0020_Name" type="xs:string" minOccurs="0" />
 <xs:element name="Snapshot_x0020_Name" type="xs:string" minOccurs="0" />
 <xs:element name="Creation_x0020_Date" type="xs:string" minOccurs="0" />
 </xs:sequence>
 </xs:complexType>
 </xs:element>
 </xs:choice>
 </xs:complexType>
 </xs:element>
 </xs:schema>
</NewDataSet>" /> <ns1:VMList IsValid="True" x:Name="vmList1" TimeInSeconds="0" Timeout="00:01:00" HostName="vCenter" DisplayName="VM List" Password="" RecoveryMethodSelection="{x:Null}" Description="Get list of virtual machine names" HostId="64" TypeName="VMList" UserName="" /> <ns2:GetRowsCount IsValid="True" x:Name="getRowsCount1" RecoveryMethodSelection="{x:Null}" ResultSet="%vmList1%" DisplayName="Get Rows Count" ResultSetName="vmList1" Description="Gets the amount of rows in a resultset." TypeName="GetRowsCount" /> <WhileActivity x:Name="whileActivity1" Condition="{x:Null}"> <SequenceActivity x:Name="sequenceActivity1"> <ns7:ExitWhile IsValid="True" x:Name="exitWhile1" RecoveryMethodSelection="{x:Null}" Counter="%getRowsCount1%" Description="Exit current while activity" DisplayName="Exit While" TypeName="ExitWhile" /> <ns8:GetCellValue IsValid="True" x:Name="ServerName" ColumnNumber="1" ResultSet="%vmList1%" RowNumber="%exitWhile1%" ResultSetName="vmList1" RecoveryMethodSelection="{x:Null}" Description="Gets a specific cell value from a resultset." DisplayName="Get Cell Value" TypeName="GetCellValue" /> <ns9:VMListSnapshot IsValid="True" x:Name="vmListSnapshot1" HostName="vCenter" TimeInSeconds="0" Timeout="00:01:00" DisplayName="VM List Snapshot" Password="" RecoveryMethodSelection="{x:Null}" Description="Get a list of all snapshots of a virtual machine" HostId="64" TypeName="VMListSnapshot" UserName="" VMName="%ServerName%" /> <ns2:GetRowsCount IsValid="True" x:Name="getRowsCount2" RecoveryMethodSelection="{x:Null}" ResultSet="%vmListSnapshot1%" DisplayName="Get Rows Count" ResultSetName="vmListSnapshot1" Description="Gets the amount of rows in a resultset." TypeName="GetRowsCount" /> <WhileActivity x:Name="whileActivity2" Condition="{x:Null}"> <SequenceActivity x:Name="sequenceActivity2"> <ns7:ExitWhile IsValid="True" x:Name="exitWhile2" RecoveryMethodSelection="{x:Null}" Counter="%getRowsCount2%" Description="Exit current while activity" DisplayName="Exit While" TypeName="ExitWhile" /> <ns10:AddMemoryTableRow Selection="2" IsValid="True" x:Name="addMemoryTableRow1" RecoveryMethodSelection="{x:Null}" ResultSet="%Report%" RowNumber="" NumberOfRows="1" ResultSetName="Report" Description="Add a memory table row." DisplayName="Add Row to Memory Table" TypeName="AddMemoryTableRow" /> <ns8:GetCellValue IsValid="True" x:Name="SnapName" ColumnNumber="1" ResultSet="%vmListSnapshot1%" RowNumber="%exitWhile2%" ResultSetName="vmListSnapshot1" RecoveryMethodSelection="{x:Null}" Description="Gets a specific cell value from a resultset." DisplayName="Get Cell Value" TypeName="GetCellValue" /> <ns11:VMSnapshotInfo IsValid="True" x:Name="vmSnapshotInfo1" HostName="vCenter" TimeInSeconds="0" Timeout="00:01:00" DisplayName="VM Snapshot Info" SnapshotName="%SnapName%" Password="" RecoveryMethodSelection="{x:Null}" Description="Get snapshot info" HostId="64" TypeName="VMSnapshotInfo" UserName="" VMName="%ServerName%" /> <ns8:GetCellValue IsValid="True" x:Name="CreationTime" ColumnNumber="6" ResultSet="%vmSnapshotInfo1%" RowNumber="1" ResultSetName="vmSnapshotInfo1" RecoveryMethodSelection="{x:Null}" Description="Gets a specific cell value from a resultset." DisplayName="Get Cell Value" TypeName="GetCellValue" /> <ns2:GetRowsCount IsValid="True" x:Name="RowNum" RecoveryMethodSelection="{x:Null}" ResultSet="%Report%" DisplayName="Get Rows Count" ResultSetName="Report" Description="Gets the amount of rows in a resultset." TypeName="GetRowsCount" /> <ns12:SetCellValue IsValid="True" ColNumber="1" RecoveryMethodSelection="{x:Null}" NewValue="%ServerName%" RowNumber="%RowNum%" VariableName="%Report%" x:Name="SetServerName" Description="Set a new value to a result set." DisplayName="Set Cell Value" TypeName="SetCellValue" /> <ns12:SetCellValue IsValid="True" ColNumber="2" RecoveryMethodSelection="{x:Null}" NewValue="%SnapName%" RowNumber="%RowNum%" VariableName="%Report%" x:Name="SetSnapshotName" Description="Set a new value to a result set." DisplayName="Set Cell Value" TypeName="SetCellValue" /> <ns12:SetCellValue IsValid="True" ColNumber="3" RecoveryMethodSelection="{x:Null}" NewValue="%CreationTime%" RowNumber="%RowNum%" VariableName="%Report%" x:Name="SetCreationTime" Description="Set a new value to a result set." DisplayName="Set Cell Value" TypeName="SetCellValue" /> </SequenceActivity> </WhileActivity> </SequenceActivity> </WhileActivity> <ns3:ConvertToHTMLTable Value="%Report%" IsValid="True" x:Name="convertToHTMLTable1" RecoveryMethodSelection="{x:Null}" Description="Convert a ResultSet to an HTML table." DisplayName="Get Date" TypeName="GetDate" TimeToAdd="0" /> <ns5:WriteXLS IsValid="True" x:Name="writeXLS1" HostName="LocalHost" TimeInSeconds="0" NewValue="%Report%" Timeout="00:01:00" DisplayName="Write Excel" Path="c:\SnapshotsReport_%getDate1%.xls" Password="" RecoveryMethodSelection="{x:Null}" Description="Write a result set as an Excel file" HostId="1" TypeName="WriteXLS" UserName="" /> <ns6:SendEmail Channel="0" TimeInSeconds="0" Subject="Snapshots Report %getDate1%" DestinationNumber="2" x:Name="sendEmail1" TemplateNumber="0" ShiftLevel="" IsValid="True" HostId="-2" TemplateName="" TypeName="SendEmail" SendRN="False" RecoveryMethodSelection="{x:Null}" DestinationTypeCc="User" DestinationType="User" HostName="{x:Null}" Timeout="00:00:00" DisplayName="Send Email" Attachments="c:\SnapshotsReport_%getDate1%.xls" Cc="" Description="Send an email to a user, a group or a duty."
